content: If you are an existing user and have problems accessing this space please contact the administrator.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses the informal 'es' for 'you'. In a formal context, particularly when addressing a user with a problem, 'usted es' would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Si usted es un usuario existente y tiene problemas al acceder a este espacio, por favor, póngase en contacto con el administrador.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'olemassaoleva' is a long and potentially awkward construction. While technically correct, it can be simplified.
The phrase 'tilaan pääsyn suhteen' is a bit clunky and indirect. It can be phrased more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos olet käyttäjä ja sinulla on ongelmia tilan käyttöön...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "administrator" is translated as "ຜູ້ເບິ່ງແຍງລະບົບ" which literally means "system overseer." While understandable, "ຜູ້ປົກຄອງ" (pook-ka-ong) which means "administrator" or "manager" would be a more accurate and common translation in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານເປັນຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ ແລະມີບັນຫາໃນການເຂົ້າເຖິງພື້ນທີ່ນີ້, ກະລຸນາຕິດຕໍ່ຜູ້ປົກຄອງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'existing user' is not accurately reflected. The Sinhala translation uses 'ඔබ මෙම අවකාශයේ ලියාපදිංචි වූ අයෙක් නම්' which translates to 'If you are registered in this space'. While related, it doesn't convey the meaning of being a pre-existing user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'ඔබ කලින් සිටින පරිශීලකයා නම්' (If you are an existing user) or 'ඔබට කලින් පිවිසීමට අවසර තිබුණු අයෙක් නම්'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could be improved for better readability. While grammatically correct, it's slightly cumbersome.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider splitting the sentence into two: 'ඔබ මෙම අවකාශයේ ලියාපදිංචි වූ අයෙක් නම්. ප්‍රවේශ වීමේ ගැටළුවක් ඇත්නම් කරුණාකර පරිපාලක අමතන්න.' (If you are registered in this space. If you have a problem accessing, please contact the administrator.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'постојец́и' is misspelled. It should be 'постојец́и'.
